# demo (unfinish)
```{r}
# df1 <- read.csv('C:\Users\user\OneDrive\Documents\AQHI data\cleansed_dataset', header = TRUE, sep = ",")
# df2 <- read.csv('C:\Users\user\OneDrive\Documents\AQHI data\cleansed_dataset', header = TRUE, sep = ",")
df <- temp_all
pollutant <- c("NO2", "SO2", "O3", "RSP", "FSP")
option_pollutant <- lapply(pollutant, function(x) list(label = x, value = x))
option_stations <- lapply(unique(df$station), function(x) list(label = x, value = x))
months <- list("01", "02", "03", "04", "05", "06", "07", "08", "09", "10", "11", "12")
option_months <- lapply(months, function(x) list(label = x, value = x))
yrs <- unique(format(df$date, format = "%Y"))


app <- dash_app()
app %>% add_stylesheet('https://codepen.io/chriddyp/pen/bWLwgP.css')

app %>% set_layout(
  div(
    style = list(
      borderBottom = 'thin lightgrey solid',
      backgroundColor = 'rgb(250, 250, 250)',
      padding = '10px 5px'
    ),

    div(
      dccDropdown(id = 'stations_option', 
                  options = option_stations, 
                  value = 'CentralWest',  
                  multi = TRUE
      ), 
      
      dccRadioItems(
        id = 'pollutant_option',
        options = option_pollutant,
        value = 'NO2', 
        labelStyle = list(display = 'inline-block')
      ),
      style = list(width = '98%', display = 'inline-block')
    ),
    
    div(
      dccGraph(
        id = 'lines'
      ),
      style = list(
        width ='49%',
        display = 'inline-block',
        padding = '0 20' 
      )
    ),

    div(
      dccGraph(id='bar'),
      dccGraph(id='pie'),
      style = list(display = 'inline-block', width = '49%')
    ),

    div(
      dccSlider(
        id = 'year_slider',
        min = 0,
        max = length(yrs)-1,
        marks = yrs,
        value = length(yrs)-1
      ),
      
      dccChecklist(
        id = "month_option", 
        options = option_months, 
        value = months,
        labelStyle = list(display = 'inline-block')
      ),
      style = list(width = '98%', padding = '0px 20px 20px 20px')
    )
  )
)


app %>% run_app()

```
